text: Oleg Nikolayevich Karavaichuk (; December 28, 1927 - June 13, 2016) was a Soviet and Russian composer, author of music for many movies and theater performances. He was born in Kyiv. Karavaychuk worked with Sergei Parajanov, Vasily Shukshin, Ilya Averbakh, Kira Muratova (Brief Encounters, The Long Goodbye) and others.Олег Каравайчук. Рояль в устах // Rolling Stone — 2011. — июль. Karavaychuk also worked with the avant-garde, in particular Sergey Kuryokhin.Скандал по-гоголевски Karavaychuk died on June 13, 2016, in St. Petersburg, aged 88.Собств. корр. title: Oleg Karavaychuk
